From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:List of hoaxes on Wikipedia
This is a copy of a previously deleted hoax article. It was deliberately created in an attempt to deceptively present false information as fact. It has been copied here solely for the purpose of documenting hoaxes on Wikipedia, in order to improve our detection and understanding of them. Do not create hoaxes on Wikipedia. If you do, you may be blocked from editing.

K890
TypeSubmachine gun
Place of originUnknown
Production history
Designed1950s

The K890 is a unique submachine gun that was manufactured as a prototype during the 1950s. The reason it was not widely manufactured was mainly due to an awkwardly shaped stock that made it difficult to use accurately and a miscalculated barrel length, which also contributed to the difficulty in aiming. After these problems were discovered the gun was discarded.

References

[[Category:Submachine guns]]
[[Category:Trial and research firearms]]
